longBusinessSummary.0: PNB Housing Finance Limited operates as a housing finance company in India. It provides loans to individuals and corporate bodies for purchase, construction, repair, and up-gradation of houses/flats/commercial properties; residential plot loans and loans for NRIs; loan against property, lease rental discounting, and loans for real estate developers; and fixed deposit products. The company also provides Unnati home loans; and credit linked subsidy scheme for economical weaker section, and lower and middle income groups. As of March 31, 2022, it operated through a network of 99 branches. The company was incorporated in 1988 and is based in New Delhi, India.
